entry.name: extraItems
entry.label: All plasmoid items that are explicitly enabled in the systray. It's a comma-separated string list of plasmoid plugin ids.

entry.name: hiddenItems
entry.label: All items that are hidden, forced always in the popup. It's a comma-separated string list of unique identifiers that are either plasmoid plugin ids or StatusNotifier ids.

entry.name: shownItems
entry.label: All items that are shown. It's a comma-separated string list of unique identifiers that are either plasmoid plugin ids or StatusNotifier ids.

entry.name: showAllItems
entry.label: If true, all systray entries will be always in the main area, outside the popup.

entry.name: scaleIconsToFit
entry.label: Whether to automatically scale System Tray icons to fix the available thickness of the panel. If false, tray icons will be capped at the smallMedium size (22px) and become a two-row/column layout when the panel is thick.

entry.name: iconSpacing
entry.label: spacing between icons, determined by this number multiplied by Kirigami.Units.smallSpacing

entry.name: pin
entry.label: Whether the popup should remain open when another window is activated
